text: John Harvard (June 4, 1938 - January 9, 2016) was a Canadian journalist and politician in Manitoba. He served as a federal Member of Parliament from 1988 to 2004, and was appointed the 23rd Lieutenant Governor of Manitoba just before Canada's federal election in 2004. Harvard died in Manitoba at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Canadian journalists Category:Writers from Manitoba Category:Politicians from Manitoba Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada
title: John Harvard (politician)
